import React, { useState } from 'react' function List({data}) { const[readMore, setReadMore]=useState(false); const[showData,setData]=useState(data); const cancel=(id)=> { const newData= showData } return (

Our Tour

{showData.map((item)=> (

{item.name}

{item.price}

{readMore ? item.para: `${item.para.substring(0,200)}...`}

))}
) } export default List
